items.content_html: The GNOME To-Do Extension is a lightweight and user-friendly extension designed to help you manage your tasks efficiently. With a minimalistic interface, it allows you to add, modify, and delete tasks effortlessly. No complicated settings, just pure productivity!
items.title: Ryusufe/Todo-In-Gnome: The GNOME To-Do Extension is a lightweight and user-friendly extension designed to help you manage your tasks efficiently. With a minimalistic interface, it allows you to add, modify, and delete tasks effortlessly. No complicated settings, just pure productivity!

items.content_html: A lightweight and modern paste bin and url shortener.
items.title: greenhat616/pastebin: A lightweight and modern paste bin and url shortener.

items.content_html: A cross-platform chat application built with Tauri, designed to be a minimalist, high-performance, and lightweight alternative to Discord. Optimized for speed and simplicity, it delivers a smooth and responsive user experience without compromising on functionality.
items.title: nnnLik/capybarka: A cross-platform chat application built with Tauri, designed to be a minimalist, high-performance, and lightweight alternative to Discord. Optimized for speed and simplicity, it delivers a smooth and responsive user experience without compromising on functionality.

items.content_html: A lightweight WebGL-based React component for creating an interactive mouse trail effect. Works with Next.js out of the box.
items.title: react18-tools/react-webgl-trails: A lightweight WebGL-based React component for creating an interactive mouse trail effect. Works with Next.js out of the box.

items.content_html: A lightweight library for managing dark mode, accommodating both user preferences and the system preference.
items.title: react18-tools/nextjs-darkmode: A lightweight library for managing dark mode, accommodating both user preferences and the system preference.

items.content_html: A highly lightweight utility that automatically detects and makes links clickable in Markdown rendered by react-markdown.
items.title: react18-tools/react-markdown-autolink: A highly lightweight utility that automatically detects and makes links clickable in Markdown rendered by react-markdown.

items.content_html: A lightweight inversion of control framework for JavaScript and TypeScript
items.title: mscharley/dot: A lightweight inversion of control framework for JavaScript and TypeScript

items.content_html: ServerPapers is a lightweight server monitoring system.
items.title: CairBin/ServerPapers: ServerPapers is a lightweight server monitoring system.

items.content_html: A lightweight wrapper over fetch with zero race conditions by default, and everything one could yearn for in a fetching library like timeouts, retries, interceptors and so much more
items.title: zayne-labs/call-api: A lightweight wrapper over fetch with zero race conditions by default, and everything one could yearn for in a fetching library like timeouts, retries, interceptors and so much more

items.content_html: A lightweight, custom router for Bun that supports GET, POST, PUT, and DELETE requests, along with middleware handling.
items.title: mahmoudalnkeeb/bun-router: A lightweight, custom router for Bun that supports GET, POST, PUT, and DELETE requests, along with middleware handling.

items.content_html: Legcord is a custom client designed to enhance your Discord experience while keeping everything lightweight.
items.title: Legcord/Legcord: Legcord is a custom client designed to enhance your Discord experience while keeping everything lightweight.

items.content_html: Very simple and lightweight AJAX implementation for Nette
items.title: matronator/axette: Very simple and lightweight AJAX implementation for Nette

items.content_html: A simple, lightweight tab switcher extension.
items.title: ByHelyo/taby: A simple, lightweight tab switcher extension.

items.content_html: A lightweight Angular component for toggling between dark and light mode, with customizable styling and persistent theme storage for a consistent user experience
items.title: AbduBehindTheCode/ngx-dark-theme: A lightweight Angular component for toggling between dark and light mode, with customizable styling and persistent theme storage for a consistent user experience

items.content_html: RRC - Powerful yet lightweight data fetching and caching library that supports normalization, built on top of redux
items.title: gentlee/react-redux-cache: RRC - Powerful yet lightweight data fetching and caching library that supports normalization, built on top of redux

items.content_html: A lightweight API for generating images from HTML templates using Puppeteer and Node.js.
items.title: rn0x/HTMLSnapshot: A lightweight API for generating images from HTML templates using Puppeteer and Node.js.

items.content_html: 七圣召唤 Lite，「原神」同人网页游戏。相比原版「七圣召唤」，具有轻量化、高自由度等特点。 ／ GITCG Lite is a "Genshin Impact" Doujin game. It is lightweight and highly customizable compared to the original game.

items.content_html: An interpreter for a new, lightweight programming language called Oyster. Might eventually be upgraded to a compiler.
items.title: electricprogramming/Oyster-Interpreter: An interpreter for a new, lightweight programming language called Oyster. Might eventually be upgraded to a compiler.

items.content_html: Ultra Mega Enumerator is a lightweight library designed to enumerate various combinatorial objects. Its goal is to provide efficient tools for generating combinations, permutations, compositions, partitions, and more.
items.title: ncg777/ultra-mega-enumerator: Ultra Mega Enumerator is a lightweight library designed to enumerate various combinatorial objects. Its goal is to provide efficient tools for generating combinations, permutations, compositions, partitions, and more.
